name: Super Robot Wars OG: The Moon Dwellers
name_original: Super Robot Wars OG: The Moon Dwellers
description:
Super Robot Wars OG: The Moon Dwellers is an action-strategy game developed by B.B.STUDIO. It was originally released in 2016. Bandai published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Super Robot Wars OG: The Moon Dwellers on PlayStation 3 and PlayStation 4.
